lead_paragraph: Caretaker manager Alan Curtis will remain in charge of Swansea City for the rest of the Premier League season, the club said on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Curtis Staying in Charge of Swansea for Rest of Season
headline.main: Curtis Staying in Charge of Swansea for Rest of Season

snippet: Caretaker manager Alan Curtis will remain in charge of Swansea City for the rest of the Premier League season, the club said on Thursday....
